item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 8)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Hunter (Level 4)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 3)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 3)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Butcher (Level 6)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 3)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Tree Trimmer (Level 3)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 1)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Cathedral Worker (Level 6)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 6)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Baptised
item.description: Set global user name using git config.

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 11)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Collector (Level 9)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Merchant (Level 5)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 3)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 10)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add
